alert.note: Alert for Cass; Henry; Johnson; Lafayette; Pettis; Ray; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 4:58PM CDT until July 14 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cass County in west central Missouri... Northern Henry County in west central Missouri... Western Pettis County in central Missouri... Southeastern Ray County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Saline County in central Missouri... Lafayette County in west central Missouri... Johnson County in west central Missouri... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lexington to near Oak Grove to 6 miles east of Adrian, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Warrensburg, Oak Grove, Odessa, Higginsville, Lexington, Windsor, Knob Noster, Concordia, Holden, Garden City, Sweet Springs, Whiteman Air Force Base, La Monte, Waverly, Wellington, Leeton, Urich, Green Ridge and Calhoun. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 30 and 74. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Henry; Johnson; Lafayette; Pettis; Ray; Saline
